0x8F2EECC3.name: START_FIND_EXTERNAL_KVP

params.name: resourceName
params.description: The resource to try finding the key/values for

0x8F2EECC3.description: Equivalent of [START_FIND_KVP](#\_0xDD379006), but for another resource than the current one.

examples.code:
local kvpHandle = StartFindExternalKvp('drugs', 'mollis:')

if kvpHandle ~= -1 then 
	local key
	
	repeat
		key = FindKvp(kvpHandle)

		if key then
			print(('%s: %s'):format(key, GetResourceKvpString(key)))
		end
	until not key

	EndFindKvp(kvpHandle)
else
	print('No KVPs found')
end

0x8F2EECC3.resultsDescription: A KVP find handle to use with [FIND_KVP](#\_0xBD7BEBC5) and close with [END_FIND_KVP](#\_0xB3210203)
